body.name: NewLife Naturals Certified Organic Vulva Cream - Menopause Support, Itching Relief, Vaginal Moisturizer & Dryness Solution | All Natural Estrogen Free Intimate Feminine Care - 2 Oz - Made in USA

climatePledgeFriendly.details: USDA Organic products are grown and processed according to standards addressing soil and water quality, among other factors.

features: CERTIFIED ORGANIC MENOPAUSE RELIEF: Crafted with natural ingredients. Our hormone-free cream addresses menopausal symptoms such as vaginal dryness, irritation, and discomfort.

ALL-NATURAL INGREDIENTS, USA-MADE: Crafted with certified organic ingredients, including Olive Oil, Beeswax, Sweet Almond Oil, Apricot Kernel Oil, Honey, and Shea Nut Butter. Manufactured in the United States, ensuring adherence to high-quality standards and regulations.
VERSATILE VAGINAL MOISTURIZATION: Addresses extreme vaginal dryness, promoting overall vaginal health and comfort. An effective, natural, estrogen-free alternative for women.

PROVIDES SUPPORT FOR FEMININE CARE: Harnesses the power of natural ingredients like Beeswax in a magical salve, providing holistic feminine care. A product for various needs such as itch relief and lubrication. For dryness, discomfort, and menopausal symptoms such as Vaginal Atrophy.
COMPREHENSIVE ALTERNATIVE SOLUTION: A reputable alternative to popular creams offering a natural and effective solution for vaginal dryness.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: How does NewLife Naturals' USDA certified organic vulva cream help with menopausal dryness and irritation? Our vulva cream is specially formulated with organic and food-grade ingredients. These ingredients work together to provide deep hydration, soothe irritation, and alleviate dryness often experienced during menopause. How often should I apply this vulva cream to see the best results for menopausal dryness? For optimal results, we recommend applying the cream as needed, especially when you experience dryness or discomfort. It can be used daily or as often as required to maintain vulva health and comfort. A little goes a long way. Is NewLife Naturals' vulva cream suitable for individuals looking for estrogen, paraben, and fragrance free options? Yes, our vulva cream is a perfect choice for those seeking a clean and natural solution. It is completely estrogen-free, paraben free, and fragrance free. All our ingredients are food grade. Does the vulva cream have a scent? We did not add fragrances or scents to the product. The purpose is to manage and help with symptoms. We did not want to add ingredients that can potentially cause irritation. Is NewLife Naturals' vulva cream suitable for individuals that do not have menopause, but are experiencing symptoms? Absolutely! Our vulva cream is suitable for individuals experiencing symptoms like dryness and irritation, regardless of whether they are in menopause. It's designed to provide relief and nourishment for a wide range of intimate skin concerns.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very creamy and effective
reviews.reviewText: This is really great stuff, it is very easy to apply due to how creamy it is. And it really helps a lot.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Where has this been all my perimenopausal life??
reviews.reviewText: This stuff is freakin’ awesome. Like so many others, I suffer from dryness. Was using a big-brand daily “moisture restore” gel; it helped a little, but only if I was religious about using it, and still didn’t quite do the job (and wore off easily). I was suffering frequent yeast infections as a result of my skin’s microbiota (the normal bacteria & yeast that are always there) being completely out of whack because it was so dry all the time.Gave this a go- holy crap! It only takes a tiny bit (a pea-size or less) and stays on all day; there’s even still the slightest bit after swimming. After a few days of use, my skin was much less inflamed, and after a week, back to normal. I can even skip a day or two now without discomfort (though I try not to!).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This product doesn’t bother my delicate skin. There is not really an odor. It provides a barrier of protection, and i love that it is all natural. Great product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: There is nothing to dislikeI am in premenapause,First day I used,I had reliefThank you

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I recommend this to anyone who has dryness down there… works great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Smooth and warm effects
reviews.reviewText: This cream is great in the sense that it gives you nice moisture around your private parts. However, I felt that it is very difficult to apply directly coz of its solid state. You have to first take it in hands and then rub it and apply to the parts which makes it little inconvenient. You get good amount in the price though.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Best I’ve found. Great consistency and no burning.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Have used this for a couple of weeks
reviews.reviewText: It works okay-I’ve had a lot better. It doesn’t last as long as I would like, but it does work. For the price, it’s definitely a good deal.

Does exactly what it is supposed to do. No more itching, dryness and painful moments of getting "stuck" to my clothing or myself. If you know, you know! I will definitely be purchasing again...and again...and again...Update: A very little goes a long way. No need to slather it on. I would like to see this in a tube as well, to carry in my purse. I love this product!
i have only used this product for a few days so far but it has really helped with razor burn! this product does not smell good and that’s hey i gave it a lower rating but again it does the job
